website_summaries.verdict: Earns our top spot for offering ample features and functions that encourage imagination and hours of play – a must have for young Peppa Pig lovers.
pros: This Peppa Pig playset has numerous features to keep your youngster entertained, including generous accessories, lots of rooms, and lights and sounds
Peppa, George, and Zoe Zebra figures are included
cons: A bit pricier than other similar Peppa Pig playsets, but you also get a lot for your money

customer_reviews.title: Love this house
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this peppa pig house ! It’s so cute and fun to play with and the sounds are nice. The people that are complaining that it doesn’t work even though they put new batteries in is because they didn’t flip the on switch which is behind the house on the green part of it.
customer_reviews.author: MArdila

customer_reviews.title: ... changed them still didn’t work it was such a disappointment!!
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t work when I received it I thought maybe it didn’t have batteries checked and it did so I changed them still didn’t work it was such a disappointment!!! My 3 year old was so happy when she seen it but kept asking why the sounds wouldn’t work after I repeatedly told her about the sounds and lights! Just buy one from somewhere else I’ve heard a lot of people saying the same thing about buying this from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Ceara bostick

customer_reviews.title: Lots of accessories and fairly sturdy. Wish there was more than 1 object that ...
customer_reviews.text: Lots of accessories and fairly sturdy. Wish there was more than 1 object that would light - given the product name said lightS. I think it's best to set this on a table and not floor as it's very low to the ground. I see they also sell additional accessories but I don't see how there would be room for them - it's feels crowded as it is with the furniture and figures in them now, the rooms are not very deep.
customer_reviews.author: MooMoo

customer_reviews.title: Best Christmas gift for my 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift for my 2 year old. She is obsessed with Peppa Pig and loves this house. She plays with it non stop. We bought a few more figurines to add with it. But it's really cute and doesn't take up too much room. The sounds and lamp that work are a nice touch. I bought it on amazon for about $20 less than in store at Toys R Us.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonGirl1983

customer_reviews.title: And the box the play house came in was in great shape. the play house looks great and sounds ...
customer_reviews.text: Came in a brown box. And the box the play house came in was in great shape . the play house looks great and sounds great . we havent played with it yet because its a birthday gift but i know its going to be loads of fun with my daughter
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: 3 year old son loves this. It is not too big, but not too small. I think it's a great size. Little pricey. It comes with furniture, Peppa, George and Zoe. I don't know where to buy mommy and daddy pig. I wanted mommy and daddy so we could all play with him together. He is not disappointed at all. I really like this product. Good for play therapy.
customer_reviews.author: Mdil

customer_reviews.title: I didn’t have to carry through store out to car!
customer_reviews.text: This was my granddaughter’s favorite birthday present. She turned 3. She didn’t want to open the rest of her presents after getting it!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth j.

customer_reviews.title: The behemoth
customer_reviews.text: A very pricey but large addition to the Peppa pig playset collection. This one has sounds that you can turn on. One thing I did notice Is win you are heavy footed and walk around this playset, that sounds will automatically activate. This can get annoying but hey, that's kind of what you sign up for when you buy child's toy that has electronic device inside of it
customer_reviews.author: Huggins

customer_reviews.title: Great little house to keep a toddler busy!
customer_reviews.text: I love how all the furniture came with this and my 2 year old daughter loves it! She typically doesn't stay interested in something for too long, but she played with this for quite awhile the first time I took it out for her and she has been playing with it all the time since she got it!
customer_reviews.author: Brianne Binge

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS PEPPA HOUSE
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS PEPPA HOUSE!!! It has a little mud puddle in the front, and if you bounce peppa on it, it plays sounds like, "I love bouncing in muddy puddles". My little girl has been playing with this EVERY DAY since we got it on Christmas. We got more of the family, so now she has everyone, even granny and grandpa.
customer_reviews.author: Carissa K

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughter since she loves Peppa Pig, I bought more of the family because all of them don't come with the set. It has nice furnishings with the house which is great because a lot of toy house barely have any extras that come with it. My granddaughter plays with it for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: L. Doronzo

customer_reviews.title: Not working
customer_reviews.text: Whoever packed this making me go crazy! Box after box and removing stuff finally opened the package and guess what?! Nothing works.
customer_reviews.author: REDFOXXX

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 5 year old boy and he loves it! It comes with a lot of toys to play with. I would recommend buying an extra set of “friends” characters as it only comes with a few.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: It’s ready to play with right out the box, batteries included.
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old daughter asked for this for her birthday after seeing it in the store. It’s a great play house. What’s even better is that it’s already assembled with batteries included. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Flicka

customer_reviews.title: Tiny human fun time.
customer_reviews.text: Tiny human loves it. It scares me randomly when I walk past it, with our hardwood floors, it'll go off and scare me. Otherwise, it's perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun, colorful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great play house! Our 2 1/2 year old plays with this all of the time. I love hearing the conversations that her little props friends are having. She often transports the entire furniture collection along with the characters into another room. Then goes back for the house and set it all up again.

customer_reviews.title: Happy toddler!

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful fun

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and not what i expected for the price.

customer_reviews.title: My 3 year old granddaughter is thrilled with this toy ...

She loves the sound affects and light feature. The furniture can all be rearranged and taken out so I also purchased some additional characters and play sets in case some get lost.

customer_reviews.title: Updated review for all 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: As many others, we too thought it didn’t work. Husband changed batteries and got nothing. He put the old ones back in and flipped a switch (that he said was hard to see/find) and it worked. Be aware that only the door mat and mud puddle make sounds and one lamp lights up. That’s it. My first review stated that the lamp didn’t light up on ours but after more playtime we realized that the lamp lights up on the 6th time the door mat is pushed/pressed. We are very happy with this toy but not sure it is worth the full price. Luckily we got ours on sale.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product, received no refund
customer_reviews.text: I'm extremely disappointed in this. I bought this for my 3-year-old daughter for Christmas. It was the only thing she wanted, so I purchased it right away. The box arrived all bent/damaged looking, but I wrapped it up anyway and gave it to her for Christmas. She was so excited, but then the lights/sounds did not work. We tried new batteries ... nothing. I cannot return it and am hoping for a refund, but the return window has passed. How was I supposed to know I received a defective product when I saved it as a Christmas gift? Now I'm out the full price of the item plus I have a broken toy. Extremely disappointing.

Any little toy 2" or less can borrow this house, tiny trolls use it and even the really small Pony toys.

product_meta.title: Peppa Pig's Lights & Sounds Family Home Feature Playset
product_meta.description: Peppa Pig Lights and Sounds Family Home Playset
feature_bullets: Experience all the sights, sounds, and phrases of Peppa Pig's family home and enjoy a day in the life of everyone's favorite pig!
Peppa's Lights and Sounds Family Home features 7 rooms and 13 never-before-seen accessories!
Includes Peppa Pig, George, and Zoe Zebra figures for endless ways to play!
The Lights and Sounds playset measures 22-inches tall and requires 2 AA batteries (demo batteries included).

Now you can add even more fun to your Lights ‘n Sounds Family Home with new Little Rooms! Each little room includes figures, furniture, and light up accessories to customize your home. Little Rooms sold separately!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars345 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
